body:
Ah. This was uploaded by the time I saw it on pixiv or it just slipped by me.

The other girl is Layla's maid. Layla is not good at japanese but it is said that she has a maid that can speak japanese well. I need to check the wiki to see if the maid part is true. I can't remember where I read it, but the artist labels her as Layla's maid on pg3
whos the other one?  that's not Natalia
I want more chocolate idolm@ster girls
